title: AI Analysis
helpText: How can I help with your plants today?
helpSubtext: I can analyze plant photos, diagnose issues, suggest nutrient schedules, or answer cultivation questions.
diagnosePrompt: My plant leaves are turning yellow. What could be wrong?
feedingPrompt: Create a feeding schedule for week 4 of flowering
disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Verify important information.
